com.facebook.litho.testing

Class InteractionUtil.Scroller

  • java.lang.Object
    • RecyclerView.OnScrollListener
      • com.facebook.litho.testing.InteractionUtil.Scroller
  • Enclosing class:
    InteractionUtil

    public static class InteractionUtil.Scroller
extends RecyclerView.OnScrollListener
    Class that keeps track of the scroll position of provided RecyclerView, and provides APIs to request scroll to a certain position
